root.name: Pitfall: The Mayan Adventure
root.description: OverviewReleased in 1994 for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System, Sega Genesis, and Sega CD. In 1995, it was released for the Sega 32X, Atari Jaguar, and PC. In 2001, it was ported to the Game Boy Advance. In 2009, the Sega Genesis version was released on the Nintendo Wii's Wii Shop as a Virtual Console title.PlotPitfall Harry, from the original Atari 2600 classic Pitfall!, has gotten himself into trouble, and it's up to his son, Pitfall Harry Jr. to save him.Easter EggsAs an Easter Egg, the original Atari 2600 game can be played by finding a secret door marked by a sprite of a scorpion from the original game.

similar_games.game: Cabbage Patch Kids Adventures in the Park
